summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 2157, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the assessment and collection of a proper proportion of the expenses of the City Engineer's office, from the Local Improvement Funds for the improvement of streets, alleys or public places, provided for in Ordinance No. 2085, approved April 29, 1892, as part of the incidental expenses of such improvements", approved June 16, 1892.
